Question
========

On a given hospital ward, over the course of a year, records are kept of how many men and how many women are lying on the first day of the month lie. The number of men is a variable measured on

Answerlist
----------

* Nominal measurement level
* Ordinal measurement level
* Interval level
* Ratio measurement level

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Nominal measurement level: Incorrect
* Ordinal measurement level: Incorrect
* Interval measurement level: Incorrect
* Ratio measurement level: Correct
